abstract: Got a good idea for a health care application? If so, you could get as much as $500,000 in funding from Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Got a good idea for a health care application? If so, you could get as much as $500,000 in funding from Microsoft.

headline.main: Microsoft Announces $3 Million Fund for Health Care Applications

abstract: Having exhausted its best ideas on how to deal with Google, Microsoft is now working its way down the list to dubious ones – like pursuing a hostile bid for Yahoo, says Randall Stross, writing in The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Having exhausted its best ideas on how to deal with Google, Microsoft is now working its way down the list to dubious ones – like pursuing a hostile bid for Yahoo, says Randall Stross, writing in The New York Times.

headline.main: Maybe Microsoft Should Stalk Different Prey

abstract: Jerry Yang is giving one of his first public appearances since Microsoft offered to buy Yahoo at the Interactive Advertising Bureau meeting in Phoenix. As a surprise, he’s going to share the stage with Sue Decker, Yahoo’s No. 2.
snippet: Jerry Yang is giving one of his first public appearances since Microsoft offered to buy Yahoo at the Interactive Advertising Bureau meeting in Phoenix. As a surprise, he’s going to share the stage with Sue Decker, Yahoo’s No. 2.

headline.main: Jerry Yang Calls on Sue Decker to Bolster Pitch

abstract: Jerry Yang, chief executive of Yahoo, spoke about how the company’s frenzied search for a way to fend off Microsoft’s bid has been an exciting journey of self discovery.
snippet: Jerry Yang, chief executive of Yahoo, spoke about how the company’s frenzied search for a way to fend off Microsoft’s bid has been an exciting journey of self discovery.
lead_paragraph: If Jerry Yang is upset that Microsoft bid to buy the company he co-founded 13 years ago, it didn’t prompt any angry words as he spoke Monday morning at the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s annual meeting in Phoenix. Rather, he talked about how the bid for Yahoo and the company’s frenzied search for a way to fend it off has been an exciting journey of self discovery.

headline.main: Yang: Microsoft Bid Was a “Galvanizing Event” for Yahoo
